p: Total PA concentrations in the well seepage waters were highest during sampling event No. 3 (Fig. 5) which corresponded with the largest biomass of adjacent butterbur. The greater plant coverage of the well (well G3, Fig. 2) was associated with higher PA concentrations in the well water. There were fewer plants around the wells at subsequent sampling events due to regular biomass cutting and removal by a maintenance company to ensure access to the wells. This biomass removal possibly caused reduced PA concentrations.
